title: Freelance Full-Stack Developer
bullets: Designed and developed a mobile-responsive user-friendly, and accessible website using Figma, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS
Developed server-side applications and RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express; integrated third-party APIs and maintained secure data handling
Enhanced web application speed and efficiency by optimizing assets, implementing caching strategies, and using performance monitoring tools
Performed unit testing, integration testing, and debugging to ensure functionality and quality; utilized tools like Jest, Cypress, and Postman
Used Git for version control and collaborated on code management through GitHub
Deployed and maintained applications on Vercel
Collaborated with clients to define project goals, requirements, and timelines
Managed project timelines and deliverables, communicated progress, and ensured client satisfaction through regular updates and feedback sessions
